Name: Glass
Effect: x2 Mult, 1 in 4 chance to destroy card

Name: Gold
Effect: $3 if this card is held in hand at end of round

Name: Lucky
Effect: 1 in 5 chance for +20 Mult. 1 in 15 chance to win $20

Name: Steel
Effect: x1.5 Mult while this card stays in hand

Name: Stone
UnlockRequirement: Note that Stone cards have no rank or suit, rather than being their own. Stone cards secretly retain a rank and suit like other playing cards, but they cannot be determined or used in scoring until the Stone enhancement is cleared or replaced.

Name: Wild
Effect: Can be used as any suit
